content.text: Hey! How is your night going?
So-so. I'm a little stressed out about my job.
Just a lot of stuff going on at work. I'm a psychology major and I'm doing my internship at a mental health clinic. I'm really passionate about psychology but I'm not sure if I'm cut out for this.

Well, I can imagine that would be stressful. I'm a bit of a psychology nerd myself, so I think it's really cool that you're doing your internship at a mental health clinic. I'm sure you're doing a great job!
Thanks, that means a lot. I'm trying my best!
What's your favorite thing about psychology?
I love learning about the human mind and how it works. I think it's so interesting how our thoughts, feelings, and behaviors are all influenced by our past experiences.
Me too! I think it's so fascinating how the brain can be both so complex and so fragile.
I'm sure you'll be great at your internship. You seem to be really passionate about psychology and you have a good understanding of it.
